price: 3. Diggah Nanu kaa oobisneh barkat-le barat (leylatul kadri bar), diggah Nanu meesiisá (kadisa) kinninoomul (Qhuraanal).
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةٖ مُّبَٰرَكَةٍۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innā anzalnāhu fī laylatin mubārakatin innā kunnā mundhirīna
